H3.text: who is the governor of indiana 2009. Mitch Daniels

A4.text: Mitch Daniels was re-inaugurated as governor of Indiana on January 12, 2009.

A5.text: Mitch Daniels served as the 49th governor of Indiana from January 2005 to January 2013.
